short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pin and organise your favorite LinkedIn profiles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkedPin adds features to your LinkedIn account like saving & tagging profiles, and taking notes. 

You often come across fascinating profiles on LinkedIn, however its burdensome to save profiles so you can return to them later. Typically, you'd resort to bookmarking these profiles in you browser or noting them down elsewhere. Bookmarking profiles is challenging on LinkedIn.

With LinkedPin, regardless of whether you are constructing a pipeline of job applicants, searching for investors or recruiters, developing industry ties, or researching about expected associations; anytime you find an individual of interest on LinkedIn, click "Pin Profile" and the profile is bookmarked for you with tags and notes.

You get a dashboard where you can view, sort, filter and edit all your pins too.
